programme.title: Ad Astra
Ad Astra
programme.desc: Ad Astra: Directed by James Gray. With Brad Pitt, Tommy Lee Jones, Ruth Negga, Donald Sutherland. Astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a mission across an unforgiving solar system to uncover the truth about his missing father and his doomed expedition that now, 30 years later, threatens the universe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2935510/","name":"Ad Astra","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTllZTdlOGEtZTBmMi00MGQ5LWFjN2MtOGEyZTliNGY1MzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODk4OTc3MTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a mission across an unforgiving solar system to uncover the truth about his missing father and his doomed expedition that now, 30 years later, threatens the universe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2935510/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThomDerd"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Br Ad Astra is a good film.","reviewBody":"Hello from Earth, Moon, Mars, Neptune, Space. Brad is all over the place. The film starts with a great sequence for approx. 7 minutes, which is captivating and visually stunning. Unfortunately, then it gets to a slow-burn mode till the story develops a bit more and we get to see another visually impressive sequence past 30 minutes. It does get more interesting later on and together with the visual impact (a kind of dreamy action sequences) and the nicely written score you will want to sit this through the end. Acting is good and for fans of Brad Pitt, this works perfect as he is in almost every scene. Science...well i am not an expert here but the things portrayed in the film are not really tied to exact science. It is the future after all and humanity knows more, right? I would not read too much into that; it will help you enjoy the film more. In contrast with some negative and maybe unrealistic reviews that I read here, if you like a mix of mild father-son drama together with sci-fi, this is a very nice film to watch. 8/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":213295,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-09-20","keywords":"astronaut,outer space,father son relationship,moon,missing father","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ad Astra","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3836788505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTJkMmViNjAtMzA3NC00N2Q0LWFhZDItZWY5ZTM1MDI3MDc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTJkMmViNjAtMzA3NC00N2Q0LWFhZDItZWY5ZTM1MDI3MDc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000169/","name":"Tommy Lee Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1550948/","name":"Ruth Negga"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0336695/","name":"James Gray"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0452101/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0336695/","name":"James Gray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1342473/","name":"Ethan Gross"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rupan sansei: Kariosutoro no shiro
Le château de Cagliostro
programme.desc: Rupan sansei: Kariosutoro no shiro: Directed by Hayao Miyazaki. With Yasuo Yamada, Eiko Masuyama, Kiyoshi Kobayashi, Makio Inoue. A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0079833/","name":"Rupan sansei: Kariosutoro no shiro","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzYyNjg3OTctNzA2ZS00NjkzLWE4MmYtZDAzZWQ0NzkyMTJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0079833/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Ryuji-2"},"dateCreated":"1999-01-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worthy of respect it's denied","reviewBody":"Hilarious comedy, tasteful romance, intense action, and colorful characters.. . No one who sees this movie would believe it was a low-budget 1979 flop. With world name director Miyazaki (few of his movies rank under 9 even on this database), the highly successful Lupin cast and the angelic Shimamoto as Clarisse, who WOULD believe it failed? This movie is the most underrated movie of all time.\n\nJust make sure you acquire a GOOD translation, if one exists. Carl "the Butcher" Macek's Streamline Pictures release got horrible ratings due to his unchecked editors, unfaithful translators and third-rate voice actors. Fan-made subtitled copies are far more enjoyable, but quality is still not guaranteed. Good luck hunting; this movie is gold.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":28864,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1979-12-15","keywords":"ring,treasure,counterfeit money,damsel in distress,castle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Castle of Cagliostro","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2743730457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGJiY2VlZGQtNjI1Mi00NTgwLWEyOGUtOTAwZDFlYzI2Mjg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGJiY2VlZGQtNjI1Mi00NTgwLWEyOGUtOTAwZDFlYzI2Mjg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0945280/","name":"Yasuo Yamada"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557968/","name":"Eiko Masuyama"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462017/","name":"Kiyoshi Kobayashi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0594503/","name":"Hayao Miyazaki"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064579/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700578/","name":"Monkey Punch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0594503/","name":"Hayao Miyazaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500897/","name":"Haruya Yamazaki"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: And So It Goes
Ainsi va la vie
programme.desc: And So It Goes: Directed by Rob Reiner. With Michael Douglas, Diane Keaton, Sterling Jerins, Annie Parisse. A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2465146/","name":"And So It Goes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwNDAwODY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI2MTUxMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2465146/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jfritzpat"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"An appreciation of a movie for seasoned adults","reviewBody":"I have enjoyed Keaton and Douglas for years - I'm not that far behind them in the birthdays I've celebrated. And this movie is no exception. My wife and I found wonderful texture in the use of minor plot points to enhance the larger story. For instance - the stray dog which at first is disliked and then accepted...the metaphor of caterpillar and butterfly. It was all very nicely done in a story that evolved at a leisurely pace and with the layers one would expect in a life. As person expecting to see fewer years than I have already seen I appreciate films that reflect some of what I have experienced - and some of which I wish I had experienced. A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2465146/","name":"And So It Goes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwNDAwODY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI2MTUxMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2465146/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jfritzpat","dateCreated":"2014-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"An appreciation of a movie for seasoned adults","reviewBody":"I have enjoyed Keaton and Douglas for years - I'm not that far behind them in the birthdays I've celebrated. And this movie is no exception. My wife and I found wonderful texture in the use of minor plot points to enhance the larger story. For instance - the stray dog which at first is disliked and then accepted...the metaphor of caterpillar and butterfly. It was all very nicely done in a story that evolved at a leisurely pace and with the layers one would expect in a life. As person expecting to see fewer years than I have already seen I appreciate films that reflect some of what I have experienced - and some of which I wish I had experienced. Movies such as these remind us, also, of the value of looking ahead to what life can hold no matter the number of years that have crinkled your brows.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13505,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2014-07-25","keywords":"cell phone video,aerial camera shot,woman wears eyeglasses,movie flop,neighbor","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"And So It Goes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3315841561","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUxNjFmNTctMjRmYy00ZmMxLTliNmYtYjE3ZWUwZWE4NjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUxNjFmNTctMjRmYy00ZmMxLTliNmYtYjE3ZWUwZWE4NjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for And So It Goes","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000140/","name":"Michael Douglas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3606106/","name":"Sterling Jerins"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001661/","name":"Rob Reiner"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0485509/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040620/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242732/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0029125/","name":"Mark Andrus"],"duration":"PT1H34M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 12 Years a Slave
12 Years a Slave
programme.desc:
12 Years a Slave: Directed by Steve McQueen. With Chiwetel Ejiofor, Dwight Henry, Dickie Gravois, Bryan Batt. In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2024544/","name":"12 Years a Slave","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExMTEzODkyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTU4NTc4OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2024544/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ClaytonDavis"},"dateCreated":"2013-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"McQueen's epic is beautiful and tragic anchored by sensational performances...","reviewBody":"Read More @ The Awards Circuit (http://www.awardscircuit.com)

One of the things that have been thrown around for months now is the notion that awards season voting bodies won't respond to it because it's too "difficult" to sit through. Let's define difficult, shall we? Is it difficult to see the first openly gay politician gunned down by his closeted colleague? Is it difficult to see a reformed convict put to death by our country for his crimes? Is it difficult to see a mother choose which one of her children dies during the Holocaust? I'd argue that these answers add up to a resounding yes. Yet, no one threw those phrases of "too difficult" around.

I've watched hundreds of films throughout my short 29-year history and I've seen some difficult cinema. Steven Spielberg's "Schindler's List" can make anyone quiver in shame as it shows the despicable reality of the Holocaust. Paul Greengrass' "United 93", which is almost an emotional biopic of America's darkest hour, makes me want to crawl up into a ball and cry. And finally, Mel Gibson's "The Passion of the Christ", one of the highest grossing films of all-time, shows the labor of our sins fleshed out into the beaten skin of an honest man. And still, no one threw these hyperbolic terms out saying, "it's too hard watch." Is it because this is an American tragedy, done by Americans? Is it the guilt of someone's ancestors manifesting it in your tear ducts? I can't answer that. Only the person who says it can. The structure of this country is built on the backs and blood of slaves. But slavery didn't just exist in America, it was everywhere. It was horrifying what occurred for over 200 years and believe it or not, still exists in some parts of the world TODAY.

Now when approaching the powerful film by McQueen and distributed by Fox Searchlight Pictures, there is a resounding honesty that McQueen and screenwriter John Ridley inhabit. There are no tricks or gimmicks, no cheap takes on a side story or character that is put there for time filling or a life-lesson for Solomon to learn. Everything is genuine. Is the film heartbreaking? Oh my God yes. Did I cry for several minutes after the screening? Embarrassingly so. I was enamored the entire time, head to toe, moment to moment.

I have long admired the talent that's been evident in the works of Chiwetel Ejiofor. I've known he was capable of what he has accomplished as Solomon Northup and he hits it out of the park. He has the urgency, worry, and drive to get home to his family and executes every emotion flawlessly even when all hope seems to be lost. Where he shines incredibly are the small nuances that he takes as the story slows down, you notice aspects of Solomon that make him even more believable.

As Edwin Epps, Solomon's last owner, Michael Fassbender digs down deep into some evil territory. Acts as the "Amon Goeth" of our tale, he is exactly what you'd expect a person who believes this should be a way of life to behave. He's vile and strikes fear into not only the people he interacts with but with the viewers who watch. As Mrs. Epps, Sarah Paulson is just as wretched. Abusive, conniving, entitled, and I loved every second of her.

Mark my words; Lupita Nyong'o is the emotional epicenter of the entire film. The heartache, tears, and anger that will grow inside during the feature will have our beautiful "Patsey" at the core. She is the great find of our film year and will surely go on to more dynamic and passionate projects in the future. You're watching the birth of a star.

Hans Zimmer puts forth a very pronounced score, enriched with all the subtle ticks that strike the chords of tone. One thing that cannot be denied is the exquisite camera work of Sean Bobbit. Weaving through the parts of boat and then through the grassroots of a cotton field, he puts himself in the leagues of Roger Deakins and Seamus McGarvey as one of the most innovative and exciting DP's in the business. Especially following his work in "The Place Beyond the Pines" earlier this year. Simply marvelous.

Oscar chances, since I know many of you are wondering. Put the Oscar's in my hands, you have a dozen nominations reap for the taking. Best Picture, Director, Lead Actor, Supporting Actor, dual Supporting Actresses, Adapted Screenplay, Production Design, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Makeup and Hairstyling, Original Score. There's also a strong and rich sound scope that is present. The sounds of nature as the slaves walk or as Solomon approaches his master's house is noticed. The big question is, can it win? I haven't seen everything yet so I cannot yet if it deserves it or not. I can say, if critics and audiences can get off this "difficult" watch nonsense and accept the cinematic endeavor as a look into our own history as told from a great auteur, there's no reason it can't top the night. I'm very aware that seeing this film along with Steve McQueen crowned by Oscar is nearly erasing 85 years of history in the Academy. Are they willing and ready to begin looking into new realms and allowing someone not necessarily in their inner circles to make a bold statement as McQueen and Ridley take in "12 Years a Slave?" I remain hopeful.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":664413,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2013-11-08","keywords":"slavery,separation from family,torture,kidnapping,racism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi302032921","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MjI1OTI2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMwODQ3MDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MjI1OTI2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMwODQ3MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0931324/","name":"Michael Kenneth Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1055413/","name":"Michael Fassbender"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2588606/","name":"Steve McQueen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0120121/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136967/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0725983/","name":"John Ridley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1185849/","name":"Solomon Northup"}],"duration":"PT2H14M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La trêve
programme.desc: L'enquête sur le meurtre de Driss Assani se poursuit. Les soupçons se portent sur le club de football dans lequel il évoluait et sur son entraîneur, Ronald Vermeiren. Des rumeurs de matchs truqués et de mafias chinoise et albanaise planent sur Heiderfeld, village d'ordinaire si paisible. Drummer est chargé de se planquer devant le domicile de Vermeiren et de l'arrêter. Emmené au commissariat, l'entraîneur reconnaît qu'il y a eu des compétitions truquées.

programme.title: La trêve
La trêve
programme.desc:
La trêve: Created by Stéphane Bergmans, Benjamin d'Aoust, Matthieu Donck. With Yoann Blanc, Jasmina Douieb, Lara Hubinont, Tom Audenaert. Crime series kick-started by the finding on a young man's body." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4792480/","name":"La trêve","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg3NjkyMzYtYWRiMi00ZDE3LWIzZGEtMTAwYWJiNWFlZGQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Crime series kick-started by the finding on a young man's body.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4792480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BeneCumb"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"A strong Belgian series taking place in the Gaume area","reviewBody":"Being a fan of Nordic and UK crime dramas, I try, from time to time, to widen my horizons and watch works with similar approach coming from other countries. A couple of times I have also come across Belgian related series and liked them rather lot.

True, they have all been Flemish ones. La trêve is the first one made in Wallonia, thus the basic language in French and the venues are so different from cities like Antwerp or Ghent... As I realised soon that the makers have liked Nordic Noir, I began to share the common feelings very soon, regardless of unknown performers and unvisited areas. The characters seemed realistic, I did not figure out the wrongdoer, the twists were there and not over-sophisticated; it is evident that a small community has its own secrets as well. 

Well, the pace was not even as the last episodes started to sum up the events perhaps too hastily, after rather slow progression before, and the parallel psychiatrist interview revealed some moments too soon. Nevertheless, La trêve is a thrilling series, unless you like constant chases and cops having cute appearance and fancy cars...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6044,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-02-21","keywords":"body","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1286724/","name":"Yoann Blanc"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4978674/","name":"Jasmina Douieb"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2727232/","name":"Lara Hubinont"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150005/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011677/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2809451/","name":"Stéphane Bergmans"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2860392/","name":"Benjamin d'Aoust"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1950061/","name":"Matthieu Donck"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3237069081","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjk0OWRhYTItMmIwOC00OGJlLWFkNmQtNmYwNWI1NmFiZmQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjk0OWRhYTItMmIwOC00OGJlLWFkNmQtNmYwNWI1NmFiZmQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Journal 64
Les enquêtes du département V : dossier 64
programme.desc: Journal 64: Directed by Christoffer Boe. With Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Fares Fares, Johanne Louise Schmidt, Søren Pilmark. A series of mysterious disappearances in 2006 are eerily connected to the same institution." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6916362/","name":"Journal 64","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc1YWEzODgtOWIyMi00ODdkLWFmMGUtZmYxOTMwN2VkZGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIxNDgzMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A series of mysterious disappearances in 2006 are eerily connected to the same institution.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6916362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cliffmerayah"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another solid Department Q case!","reviewBody":"If you haven't seen the previous episodes, I strongly suggest you do. It explains the bound between the two protagonists. Once again Department Q delivers an emotional and strongly written police adventure. By now it's hard to imagine a movie in these series without the constant switch between past and present. It's an interesting way to uncover the timeline and the motives of each character. It just works really well. Is it the best one in these series? Probably not. But it's still worth your time, even if you haven't seen the previous three films. I hope there will be more of these.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14525,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Crime","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-10-04","keywords":"police procedural,shower,corpse,detective,investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509263/","name":"Nikolaj Lie Kaas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267241/","name":"Fares Fares"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4826698/","name":"Johanne Louise Schmidt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1061993/","name":"Christoffer Boe"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136662/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001935/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647695/","name":"Jussi Adler-Olsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1064048/","name":"Nikolaj Arcel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0360694/","name":"Bo Hr. It explains the bound between the two protagonists. Once again Department Q delivers an emotional and strongly written police adventure. By now it's hard to imagine a movie in these series without the constant switch between past and present. It's an interesting way to uncover the timeline and the motives of each character. It just works really well. Is it the best one in these series? Probably not. But it's still worth your time, even if you haven't seen the previous three films. I hope there will be more of these.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14525,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Crime","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-10-04","keywords":"police procedural,shower,corpse,detective,investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509263/","name":"Nikolaj Lie Kaas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267241/","name":"Fares Fares","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4826698/","name":"Johanne Louise Schmidt"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1061993/","name":"Christoffer Boe"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136662/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001935/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647695/","name":"Jussi Adler-Olsen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1064048/","name":"Nikolaj Arcel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0360694/","name":"Bo Hr. programme.sub-title: S1 E6 S1 E6 Tyrannen

credits.actor: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill, Thomas Sadoski

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1870479, Title: The Newsroom, --- Description: The Newsroom: Created by Aaron Sorkin. With Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill. A newsroom undergoes some changes in its workings and morals as a new team is brought in, bringing unexpected results for its existing news anchor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1870479/","name":"The Newsroom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI0OWIwMTgtZGIyOC00ODRhLWIwNjAtOWViZmMwOWYwOGViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A newsroom undergoes some changes in its workings and morals as a new team is brought in, bringing unexpected results for its existing news anchor.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1870479/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mynexthome","dateCreated":"2014-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Over, but not forgotten","reviewBody":"Maybe I am just coming into adulthood after my 45 years, but The Newsroom has always been food for thought. The pace, direction and writing has been excellent. I have watched and re-watched every episode over the past 3 seasons and really can't understand why they would cancel this show for the ages. First I was not a person that watched West Wing. I was younger and dumber for the show to stick. this show grabbed me from the get go and I have never been more surprised with it's greatness.

HBO - why oh why are buying into the big network belief that the public is not getting what you bring us. This show is why I subscribe to your network and seeing it leave is a shame. The past episode "Oh Shenandoah" was brilliant is so many ways. It left me thinking about my father and how we can challenge ourselves in moments of being tested. I came here to tell everyone I will watch the last episode with sadness and wish I could continue this great program going forward, but it's over. I will save these three seasons and remember every episode with fondness and hope to see these great actors, directors and writers in the future where they can continue to express themselves without worrying about ratings or money driven desires.

Thank you for 3 great seasons!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":108689,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-24","keywords":"newsroom,ethics,television producer,news reporting,tv news","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001099/","name":"Jeff Daniels","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607865/","name":"Emily Mortimer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0302330/","name":"John Gallagher Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284741/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0815070/","name":"Aaron Sorkin"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3499276825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVjNmNhNTEtYWQyZi00OTljLWI1YjUtMGMyNGFlOWM4NDg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVjNmNhNTEtYWQyZi00OTljLWI1YjUtMGMyNGFlOWM4NDg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0421030, Title: Big Love, --- Description: Big Love: Created by Mark V. Olsen, Will Scheffer. With Bill Paxton, Jeanne Tripplehorn, Chloë Sevigny, Ginnifer Goodwin. A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0421030/","name":"Big Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjEzNTE0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM3MDAzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0421030/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rogue-32","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tricky premise, handled with charm","reviewBody":"I was curious about this series because I like Paxton, Sevigny and Tina Majorino in particular, and also Harry Dean Stanton (whom I got to see play blues at the Mint, in L.A., a couple of years ago - got his autograph that night as well, which was very cool). I don't agree with 'the principle', but I do like the series.\n\nThey've taken a potentially combustible premise and managed to make it charming and almost 'normal' - after a few episodes, it didn't seem odd at all that Bill has more than one wife. I like the interaction between the characters, the women in particular, and the side-story involving Bruce Dern is hilarious and tragic at the same time. They're walking a fine line here, and I would say, after viewing 2 seasons' worth of episodes now, they're pulling it off magnificently.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20762,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-03-12","keywords":"polygamist,large family,gay mormon,polygamy,secret","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000675/","name":"Jeanne Tripplehorn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001721/","name":"Chloë Sevigny"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050662/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647739/","name":"Mark V. Olsen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770504/","name":"Will Scheffer"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Big Love","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2768149273","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A critic's trailer for the HBO drama "Big Love," now airing its final season."</script><metacontent="

A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0421030/","name":"Big Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjEzNTE0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM3MDAzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0421030/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rogue-32","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tricky premise, handled with charm","reviewBody":"I was curious about this series because I like Paxton, Sevigny and Tina Majorino in particular, and also Harry Dean Stanton (whom I got to see play blues at the Mint, in L.A., a couple of years ago - got his autograph that night as well, which was very cool). I don't agree with 'the principle', but I do like the series.\n\nThey've taken a potentially combustible premise and managed to make it charming and almost 'normal' - after a few episodes, it didn't seem odd at all that Bill has more than one wife. I like the interaction between the characters, the women in particular, and the side-story involving Bruce Dern is hilarious and tragic at the same time. They're walking a fine line here, and I would say, after viewing 2 seasons' worth of episodes now, they're pulling it off magnificently.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20762,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-03-12","keywords":"polygamist,large family,gay mormon,polygamy,secret","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000675/","name":"Jeanne Tripplehorn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001721/","name":"Chloë Sevigny"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050662/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647739/","name":"Mark V. Olsen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770504/","name":"Will Scheffer"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Big Love","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2768149273","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A critic's trailer for the HBO drama "Big Love," now airing its final season."</script><metacontent="

A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gidget234","dateCreated":"2005-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"This show is G-O-O-D!","reviewBody":"The 2nd Season of "Greys Anatomy" has commenced and it is just as great as the 1st Season! This season the writers appear to be focusing on the development of the characters. They are finally giving Alex a soul by showing the inner turmoils he possesses which gives reason for his rude demeanor.

Similar to a lot of other shows, in my opinion, the supporting cast steal the show! Christina (Sandra Oh) is my favorite because her character is so complex and hilarious! It may also be because she is the comic relief, along with George (T.R Knight).

This show is great...and it just keeps getting better! Tune in! I highly recommend it! Grey's Anatomy has everything: drama, comedy, mystery, scandal and thrill.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":271374,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0413573, Title: Grey's Anatomy, --- Description: Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":270305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2249007, Title: Ray Donovan, --- Description: Ray Donovan: Created by Ann Biderman. With Liev Schreiber, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok, Pooch Hall. Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2249007/","name":"Ray Donovan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY1MTE2MmItNzQyNi00YThjLWE4ZDctMDA0ZGE3OWJhYTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2249007/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TakeUpReel","dateCreated":"2020-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Ray Donovan Drinking Game...","reviewBody":"Take a shot if a character says:


* What?
* Sure
* It doesn't matter
* Get in the car


If you really want to raise the stakes, take a half shot every time a character says:


* F. you
* Go F. yourself


You may want to have medical professionals standing by for the last two.

This show started off great. It got boring during the middle seasons, but season 6 was very good. I have mixed emotions about season 7. They provided a lot of interesting back story for a few characters, but they left a lot of loose threads at the end.

The whole series showed way too much of Ray's daughter. She got somewhat interesting in Season 6, but then I, once again, lost interest in her during season 7.

I'm glad Ray's son wasn't shown much during the last few seasons. He was an annoying character from the beginning.

Overall, it's a good show if you can stick with the boring bits.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80309,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-06-18","keywords":"female investigator,nudity,fixer,fbi agent,brother sister relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0550371/","name":"Eddie Marsan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005231/","name":"Dash Mihok"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093837/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0081189/","name":"Ann Biderman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2778578713","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Ray makes personal progress, there are dangers that require the Ray Donovan of old. Between the NYC mayor, an unrelenting NYPD officer and clients old and new, Ray struggles to find a balance between fixing for clients and fixing himself. Premieres November 17 at 8/7c. Starring Liev Schreiber and Jon Voight."</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2249007, Title: Ray Donovan, --- Description: Ray Donovan: Created by Ann Biderman. With Liev Schreiber, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok, Pooch Hall. Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2249007/","name":"Ray Donovan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY1MTE2MmItNzQyNi00YThjLWE4ZDctMDA0ZGE3OWJhYTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2249007/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TakeUpReel","dateCreated":"2020-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Ray Donovan Drinking Game...","reviewBody":"Take a shot if a character says:


* What?
* Sure
* It doesn't matter
* Get in the car


If you really want to raise the stakes, take a half shot every time a character says:


* F. you
* Go F. yourself


You may want to have medical professionals standing by for the last two.

This show started off great. It got boring during the middle seasons, but season 6 was very good. I have mixed emotions about season 7. They provided a lot of interesting back story for a few characters, but they left a lot of loose threads at the end.

The whole series showed way too much of Ray's daughter. She got somewhat interesting in Season 6, but then I, once again, lost interest in her during season 7.

I'm glad Ray's son wasn't shown much during the last few seasons. He was an annoying character from the beginning.

Overall, it's a good show if you can stick with the boring bits.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80309,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-06-18","keywords":"female investigator,nudity,fixer,fbi agent,brother sister relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0550371/","name":"Eddie Marsan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005231/","name":"Dash Mihok"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093837/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0081189/","name":"Ann Biderman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2778578713","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Ray makes personal progress, there are dangers that require the Ray Donovan of old. programme.desc: Britannia: Created by Jez Butterworth, Tom Butterworth, James Richardson. With David Morrissey, Eleanor Worthington-Cox, Julian Rhind-Tutt, Liana Cornell. In 43 AD, the Roman Army returns to crush the Celtic heart of Britannia." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5932548/","name":"Britannia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmM2ZjA1NTAtZTBkNi00YmY2LTlhODItNWRlMmIxMzZjMjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjkwOTAyMDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 43 AD, the Roman Army returns to crush the Celtic heart of Britannia.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5932548/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dank1994"},"dateCreated":"2018-01-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ignore all these chumps, it's an entertaining watch that captures the ancient Roman perceptions of Britain well","reviewBody":"There's plenty of people on here that are taking the series and its historical accuracy too seriously, even to the point that someone seems to figure themselves as more well informed than the Roman historian Mary beard (looking at you Allen). I'm currently undergoing my Masters in Roman History, and just a little newsflash mate, ancient Britain was famous for its warrior queens (esp. Cartimandua and Boudicca) which are mentioned in Tacitus - do your homework and stop thinking you're an expert because you've read Herodotus lol. Also Rome pooled auxiliaries from all over the empire including its North African provinces, and due to the migratory nature of the peoples from Sub-Saharan Africa, and the plethora of reports about peoples below the desert its not unlikely that these people wanted to live in the prosperous North African provinces of the Roman Empire and took up military service with its lucrative benefits. Either way, its not the point; the show captures the perceived mysticism and magical Roman conceptions of Britain well. It was seen by Roman and Greek writers as the land at the end of the world where magic and human sacrifice among other abominations occured. Yes the show deviates away from certain historical events, but the invasion of Claudius was not all that well documented, and it still captures the internal strife and rivalry well, as well as the mysterious prominence of the druids in celtic culture. It's quite sad really how many people are trying to be historians while watching a sky drama: the cast is good, some of the characters are endearing, and for the shows early days, it looks promising. Stop trying to step into academic fields that you're clearly not all that well acquainted and just enjoy the drama. Jheeeeezus.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13431,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-01-18","keywords":"soldier,roman army,roman conquest of britain,druid,female warrior","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607375/","name":"David Morrissey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5732956/","name":"Eleanor Worthington-Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722279/","name":"Julian Rhind-Tutt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319272/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0165439/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050995/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125336/","name":"Jez Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125358/","name":"Tom Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724597/","name":"James Richardson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Britannia: Ready","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3585458457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzJmZTFiNjUtYmI4MS00NzcwLTlmZDctNDkzYTc0Mzk3MjNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzJmZTFiNjUtYmI4MS00NzcwLTlmZDctNDkzYTc0Mzk3MjNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Britannia: Ready"}}</script><metacontent="

With David Morrissey, Eleanor Worthington-Cox, Julian Rhind-Tutt, Liana Cornell. In 43 AD, the Roman Army returns to crush the Celtic heart of Britannia." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5932548/","name":"Britannia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmM2ZjA1NTAtZTBkNi00YmY2LTlhODItNWRlMmIxMzZjMjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjkwOTAyMDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 43 AD, the Roman Army returns to crush the Celtic heart of Britannia.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5932548/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dank1994","dateCreated":"2018-01-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ignore all these chumps, it's an entertaining watch that captures the ancient Roman perceptions of Britain well","reviewBody":"There's plenty of people on here that are taking the series and its historical accuracy too seriously, even to the point that someone seems to figure themselves as more well informed than the Roman historian Mary beard (looking at you Allen). I'm currently undergoing my Masters in Roman History, and just a little newsflash mate, ancient Britain was famous for its warrior queens (esp. Cartimandua and Boudicca) which are mentioned in Tacitus - do your homework and stop thinking you're an expert because you've read Herodotus lol. Also Rome pooled auxiliaries from all over the empire including its North African provinces, and due to the migratory nature of the peoples from Sub-Saharan Africa, and the plethora of reports about peoples below the desert its not unlikely that these people wanted to live in the prosperous North African provinces of the Roman Empire and took up military service with its lucrative benefits. Either way, its not the point; the show captures the perceived mysticism and magical Roman conceptions of Britain well. It was seen by Roman and Greek writers as the land at the end of the world where magic and human sacrifice among other abominations occured. Yes the show deviates away from certain historical events, but the invasion of Claudius was not all that well documented, and it still captures the internal strife and rivalry well, as well as the mysterious prominence of the druids in celtic culture. It's quite sad really how many people are trying to be historians while watching a sky drama: the cast is good, some of the characters are endearing, and for the shows early days, it looks promising. Stop trying to step into academic fields that you're clearly not all that well acquainted and just enjoy the drama. programme.title: Robert de Niro, Sr. – Eine Hommage
programme.desc: Robert De Niro Sr. war in den 40er und 50er Jahren ein anerkannter Maler in den USA. Peggy Guggenheim stellte seine Werke aus. Doch seine Karriere war nur von kurzer Dauer. Die Vertreter des abstrakten Expressionismus und der Pop-Art verdrängten die eher traditionellen Künstler wie Robert De Niro Sr. Sein Sohn, die Schauspieler-Ikone Robert De Niro, erinnert an seinen Vater und dessen Kunst.
programme.category: Nachrichten

programme.title: The Newsroom
The Newsroom
programme.sub-title: S2 E1 S2 E1 Als Erstes lasst uns alle Anwälte töten

credits.actor: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, Sam Waterston, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1870479, Title: The Newsroom, --- Description: The Newsroom: Created by Aaron Sorkin. With Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill. A newsroom undergoes some changes in its workings and morals as a new team is brought in, bringing unexpected results for its existing news anchor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1870479/","name":"The Newsroom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDI0OWIwMTgtZGIyOC00ODRhLWIwNjAtOWViZmMwOWYwOGViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A newsroom undergoes some changes in its workings and morals as a new team is brought in, bringing unexpected results for its existing news anchor.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1870479/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mynexthome","dateCreated":"2014-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Over, but not forgotten","reviewBody":"Maybe I am just coming into adulthood after my 45 years, but The Newsroom has always been food for thought. The pace, direction and writing has been excellent. I have watched and re-watched every episode over the past 3 seasons and really can't understand why they would cancel this show for the ages. First I was not a person that watched West Wing. I was younger and dumber for the show to stick. this show grabbed me from the get go and I have never been more surprised with it's greatness.

HBO - why oh why are buying into the big network belief that the public is not getting what you bring us. This show is why I subscribe to your network and seeing it leave is a shame. The past episode "Oh Shenandoah" was brilliant is so many ways. It left me thinking about my father and how we can challenge ourselves in moments of being tested. I came here to tell everyone I will watch the last episode with sadness and wish I could continue this great program going forward, but it's over. I will save these three seasons and remember every episode with fondness and hope to see these great actors, directors and writers in the future where they can continue to express themselves without worrying about ratings or money driven desires.

Thank you for 3 great seasons!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":108689,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-24","keywords":"newsroom,ethics,television producer,news reporting,tv news","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001099/","name":"Jeff Daniels","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607865/","name":"Emily Mortimer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0302330/","name":"John Gallagher Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284741/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0815070/","name":"Aaron Sorkin"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3499276825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVjNmNhNTEtYWQyZi00OTljLWI1YjUtMGMyNGFlOWM4NDg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVjNmNhNTEtYWQyZi00OTljLWI1YjUtMGMyNGFlOWM4NDg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0421030, Title: Big Love, --- Description: Big Love: Created by Mark V. Olsen, Will Scheffer. With Bill Paxton, Jeanne Tripplehorn, Chloë Sevigny, Ginnifer Goodwin. A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0421030/","name":"Big Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjEzNTE0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM3MDAzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0421030/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rogue-32","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tricky premise, handled with charm","reviewBody":"I was curious about this series because I like Paxton, Sevigny and Tina Majorino in particular, and also Harry Dean Stanton (whom I got to see play blues at the Mint, in L.A., a couple of years ago - got his autograph that night as well, which was very cool). I don't agree with 'the principle', but I do like the series.\n\nThey've taken a potentially combustible premise and managed to make it charming and almost 'normal' - after a few episodes, it didn't seem odd at all that Bill has more than one wife. I like the interaction between the characters, the women in particular, and the side-story involving Bruce Dern is hilarious and tragic at the same time. They're walking a fine line here, and I would say, after viewing 2 seasons' worth of episodes now, they're pulling it off magnificently.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20762,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-03-12","keywords":"polygamist,large family,gay mormon,polygamy,secret","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000675/","name":"Jeanne Tripplehorn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001721/","name":"Chloë Sevigny"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050662/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647739/","name":"Mark V. Olsen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770504/","name":"Will Scheffer"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Big Love","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2768149273","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A critic's trailer for the HBO drama "Big Love," now airing its final season."</script><metacontent="

A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0421030/","name":"Big Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjEzNTE0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM3MDAzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0421030/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rogue-32","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tricky premise, handled with charm","reviewBody":"I was curious about this series because I like Paxton, Sevigny and Tina Majorino in particular, and also Harry Dean Stanton (whom I got to see play blues at the Mint, in L.A., a couple of years ago - got his autograph that night as well, which was very cool). I don't agree with 'the principle', but I do like the series.\n\nThey've taken a potentially combustible premise and managed to make it charming and almost 'normal' - after a few episodes, it didn't seem odd at all that Bill has more than one wife. I like the interaction between the characters, the women in particular, and the side-story involving Bruce Dern is hilarious and tragic at the same time. They're walking a fine line here, and I would say, after viewing 2 seasons' worth of episodes now, they're pulling it off magnificently.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20762,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-03-12","keywords":"polygamist,large family,gay mormon,polygamy,secret","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000675/","name":"Jeanne Tripplehorn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001721/","name":"Chloë Sevigny"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050662/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647739/","name":"Mark V. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2249007, Title: Ray Donovan, --- Description: Ray Donovan: Created by Ann Biderman. With Liev Schreiber, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok, Pooch Hall. Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2249007/","name":"Ray Donovan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY1MTE2MmItNzQyNi00YThjLWE4ZDctMDA0ZGE3OWJhYTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2249007/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TakeUpReel","dateCreated":"2020-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Ray Donovan Drinking Game...","reviewBody":"Take a shot if a character says:


* What?
* Sure
* It doesn't matter
* Get in the car


If you really want to raise the stakes, take a half shot every time a character says:


* F. you
* Go F. yourself


You may want to have medical professionals standing by for the last two.

This show started off great. It got boring during the middle seasons, but season 6 was very good. I have mixed emotions about season 7. They provided a lot of interesting back story for a few characters, but they left a lot of loose threads at the end.

The whole series showed way too much of Ray's daughter. She got somewhat interesting in Season 6, but then I, once again, lost interest in her during season 7.

I'm glad Ray's son wasn't shown much during the last few seasons. He was an annoying character from the beginning.

Overall, it's a good show if you can stick with the boring bits.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80309,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-06-18","keywords":"female investigator,nudity,fixer,fbi agent,brother sister relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0550371/","name":"Eddie Marsan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005231/","name":"Dash Mihok"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093837/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0081189/","name":"Ann Biderman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2778578713","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Ray makes personal progress, there are dangers that require the Ray Donovan of old. Between the NYC mayor, an unrelenting NYPD officer and clients old and new, Ray struggles to find a balance between fixing for clients and fixing himself. Premieres November 17 at 8/7c. Starring Liev Schreiber and Jon Voight."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Disturbing the Peace
Disturbing the Peace
programme.desc: Disturbing the Peace: Directed by York Alec Shackleton. With Guy Pearce, Devon Sawa, Kelly Greyson, Michael Sirow. A small-town marshal who hasn't carried a gun since he left the Texas Rangers after a tragic shooting, must pick up his gun again to battle with a gang of outlaw bikers that has invaded the town to pull off a brazen and violent heist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5717194/","name":"Disturbing the Peace","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJiNzExYjgtYWY5Yy00MGIyLWFjM2MtMzZmYTIyZWFiNGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A small-town marshal who hasn't carried a gun since he left the Texas Rangers after a tragic shooting, must pick up his gun again to battle with a gang of outlaw bikers that has invaded the town to pull off a brazen and violent heist","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5717194/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"quickfive-62655"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Astonishing that this was released","reviewBody":"Guy Pearce and Devon Sawa were fine but everything beyond that was laughable. programme.title: Swelter
Swelter
programme.desc:
Swelter: Directed by Keith Parmer. With Alfred Molina, Jean-Claude Van Damme, Courtney Hope, Lennie James. Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2112277/","name":"Swelter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4OTQ4Nzg4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk0MTQyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2112277/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hp-anzinger"},"dateCreated":"2014-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Trailer looked good - but movie didn't work","reviewBody":"The good: The cinematography is really nice (except for a view hiccups).

The bad: Jean-Claude Van Damme does not so bad as usual (isn't much in the movie)

The ugly: Characters and story The whole movie doesn't make any sense - not even a little bit. I don't wanna spoil for the brave that sit trough the movie - but its bad, really bad.

In this movie you will see characters (yes I mean plural) that have no soul, are cliché, unbelievable and really stupid.

And if I say stupid I really mean it - almost nobody of the main characters would live that long if they where like this forever (but the movie didn't mention a chemical plant accident where everybody got insane - so ...)

For me it's always surprising to see that really bad scipts are getting money (and we talk about millions) - where clearly no money can't be made. OK yes Tarantino or Robert Rodriguez could make this film work (but hey they would cast the right actors and give them some crazy lines to work with)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3023,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-05-22","keywords":"neo western,neo noir,gangster,low budget,police shootout","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Swelter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2478943257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNTFiN2UtMDc1Ny00MzZkLTg0MjEtMjE0NGFmYmUwMTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNTFiN2UtMDc1Ny00MzZkLTg0MjEtMjE0NGFmYmUwMTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Swelter"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000547/","name":"Alfred Molina"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000241/","name":"Jean-Claude Van Damme"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890824/","name":"Courtney Hope"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2978815/","name":"Keith Parmer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0404324/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0414337/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0414739/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2978815/","name":"Keith Parmer"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

Dear director and screenwriter if you want to make a movie like this watchable, please make the couple at least likable. 

To the casting director, I know you are on a budget but you can find lots of starving actors who are 1000 times better than these 2. To the actors well I suggest you find another line of work.

I only gave it 1 star because I couldn't give it zero. programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc:
Kingsman: The Secret Service: Directed by Matthew Vaughn. With Adrian Quinton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong, Jonno Davies. A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2802144/","name":"Kingsman: The Secret Service","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTM3ZTllNzItNTNmOS00NzJiLTg1MWMtMjMxNDc0NmJhODU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2802144/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Quint1965"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hilarious! This could be the surprise hit of 2015","reviewBody":"Well folks, that's how it's done. Ever thought MI-6 (note: that's what the British call their secret service) is a club for snobbish, upper class dudes who like to watch paint dry all they long? OK, Bond is kind of cool (I hated the last two, though), but now we finally got a film that takes spy movies to the next level. Not since 'District 9' have I had that feeling during the watching of a film like "this movie just does everything right" (by which I mean of course: it plays exactly to MY taste). 

Compared to this film, every James Bond movie released after 'Licence to Kill' looks like a snore-fest. This is such a kick-ass, "balls against the wall" crazy ride that I had to shake my head several times in disbelief during the screening I was invited to. And I actually knew what I was in for. I've seen every film by Matthew Vaughn, but I was not prepared how far he was willing to go with this one. Thought 'Kick-Ass' was pretty crazy? Wait till you see this.

One of the key ingredients is the casting of the actors. The well known stars all play against type, which makes this even more unreal. Remember that lame dude who mainly played lame dudes in girlie movies like 'Bridget Jones'? He just won an Oscar for playing the stuttering King of England, and as you will see in 'Kingsman', that Oscar was well deserved: that dude (Colin Firth) can play anything! He's more bad-ass in this than Bond ever was!

A word to the wise, though, this film is not for the easily offended or the squeamish. It is a comedy but a very, very violent kind of comedy. And the language alone will shock the MPAA out of their pants. Watch this if you're into films like 'Lock, Stock', 'Kick-Ass', or 'In Bruges' and you'll probably love it - don't bother if you're more into serious films or family friendly comedies. As for me, I had a (bloody) good time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":615219,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-01-29","keywords":"spy,training,female rear nudity,class differences,death of father","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1901244185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzk1MTc4NDE2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQxMjY1MzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzk1MTc4NDE2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQxMjY1MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A super-secret spy organization recruits an unrefined but promising street kid into the agency's ultra-competitive training program just as a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5473782/","name":"Taron Egerton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891216/","name":"Matthew Vaughn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0165404/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0541631/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0963359/","name":"Jane Goldman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891216/","name":"Matthew Vaughn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2092839/","name":"Mark Millar"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="
